metadata.title: Hassan Amini Front-end Developer | Portfolio
metadata.description: Hassan Amini - Frontend Developer specializing in React, Next.js, and modern web technologies. Explore my portfolio showcasing responsive web applications, interactive user interfaces, and innovative frontend solutions.
metadata.author: Hassan Amini
metadata.keywords: Portfolio, Web Development, Frontend Developer, React, Next.js, TypeScript, JavaScript, UI/UX, Responsive Design, Frontend Engineer

home.name: Hassan Amini
home.shortBio: Passionate about building beautiful and efficient user experiences with modern web technologies.

about.title: About Me
about.subtitle: A short story of my professional journey
paragraphs: I am a frontend developer with [number] years of experience in building responsive and interactive websites and applications. I am passionate about turning creative ideas into clean and efficient code.

Throughout my professional journey, I have worked with various technologies such as React, Next.js, TypeScript, and styling tools like Tailwind CSS, and I am always seeking to learn and update my knowledge.
My goal is to collaborate with creative teams to build products that not only have an attractive appearance but also provide a smooth and enjoyable experience for users.
